title: framus cobra haus til sölu!
text:
http://framus.com/modules/produkte/produkt.php?submenuID=14244&katID=11067&cl=EN
hérna er linkur á síðunni
A 100-watt tube head with a metallic grill front face. Each channel has its own 3-band equalizer as well as volume, gain and presence controls. The Clean channel has a Bright switch; the Crunch and Lead channel each have a Notch switch. It also sports two switchable Master volumes, a Deep control, a parallel effects loop, an integrated MIDI interface and 4, 8 and 16 ohms speaker output impedance.
100 watts alltube amp
Valves: 5x ECC 83 by JJ, 4x EL 34 by Electro Harmonix (selected quartet)
3 channels (Clean, Crunch and Lead)
Gain, Bass, Middle, Treble and Presence controls for each channel
Notch switches for Crunch and Lead
Parallel effects loop
Effect Mix control
Deep control to set the amount of low end in the power amp stage
Master 1 and 2, switchable
Integrated MIDI interface
4, 8 and 16 ohms speaker output impedance, switchable
Metallic grill front face
Weight: 21 kg
Dimensions (W/H/D): 0,72 x 0,28 x 0,26 m
Made in Germany
set á hann 150þús en skoða skipti á öðrum combo lampamögnurum líka
